import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../Context/UserContext' const UpdateProfile = () => { const {user, setUser} = useContext(UserContext); const [name, setName] = useState(user.name); const [email, setEmail] = useState(user.email); const [age, setAge] = useState(user.age); return (
